title: Drew Brees faces backlash from teammates and around the league
description:
Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough discuss Drew Brees' comments regarding kneeling during the national anthem and the subsequent backlash he drew from members of the Saints and many others in and out of NFL circles. 

*Note this podcast was recorded early Thursday afternoon.
